triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The foundational learning paradigm that the survey reviews and extends to multi-agent scenarios.

triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The core technique combining deep learning with reinforcement learning that the survey focuses on.

triples.name: Multi-agent learning
triples.relevance: The primary domain of study combining multiple learning agents in shared environments.

triples.name: Cooperative game theory
triples.relevance: Theoretical framework underlying cooperative multi-agent scenarios reviewed in the survey.

triples.name: Non-cooperative game theory
triples.relevance: Theoretical framework underlying competitive multi-agent scenarios reviewed in the survey.
